title: PlayStation 5 Pro: Buy Now or Pay Tariffs Later? Here's How Much It Costs to Finance the Gaming Console
description: Trump's tariffs could hike the price tag of the PS5 Pro by 40%. I analyzed the costs and risks of different financing options.
content:
Popular imported video game consoles like the PlayStation 5 Pro could become more expensive next year if President-elect Donald Trump's proposed tariffs are implemented -- and gamers are worried.
